<title level="1" pfs="Limited">[Ship Captain](/NPCs.aspx?ID=954)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The captain is the ultimate authority on a vessel, responsible for the livelihood and well-being of everyone on the ship.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 22

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 6">[Ship Captain](/NPCs.aspx?ID=954)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="LN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 243</row>

**Perception** +12

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +10, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +12, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) +11, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +13, [Sailing Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +17, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +10

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +2

**Con** +0

**Int** +1

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +3
</row>

**Items**
[Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), [Hand Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=69) (10 bolts), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [_+1 rapier_](/Weapons.aspx?ID=36)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 23 

**Fort** +12 

**Ref** +12 

**Will** +14 

</row>

**HP** 90

**Bravery** When the ship captain rolls a success on a Will save against a [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68) effect, they get a critical success instead. In addition, anytime they gain the [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) condition, reduce its value by 1.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_rapier_ +17 ([deadly 1d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 1d6+10 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
main-gauche +16 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Parry](/Traits.aspx?ID=190), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+10 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hand crossbow +14 ([range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6+6 piercing

**Dual Disarm** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The captain makes two Strikes, one with their rapier and one with their main-gauche (in either order). If both Strikes hit, the ship captain can attempt to [Disarm](/Actions.aspx?ID=41) the target. Their multiple attack penalty increases only after all the attacks are made.

**No Quarter!** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Linguistic](/Traits.aspx?ID=101), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) The captain orders their shipmates to fight without mercy. All allied creatures of equal or lower level within 20 feet of the ship captain gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls until the end of the ship captain's next turn.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-196" />
